DOC.brief_title: Phase I Trial Endocavitary Injection Bone Marrow Derived CD133+ Cells Ischemic Refractory Cardiomyopathy ( RECARDIO Trial )
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I study investigate safety preliminary efficacy endocavitary injection bone-marrow-derived CD133+ cell 15 patient ischemic heart failure ( IHF ) eligible conventional revascularization . Patients eligible undergo bone-marrow aspiration . On day follow bone-marrow aspiration patient undergo fluoroscopy-based endocavitary intramyocardial injection target area previously identify gated-SPECT/CMR . CD133+ cell suspend physiological saline supplement 5 % human albumin solution inject myocardium via endocardial route . After discharge , efficacy follow-up last 6-months safety follow-up ( FU ) extend 1 year .
